azurerm_private_dns_srv_record.description: Manages a Private DNS SRV Record.

name.description: The name of the DNS SRV Record. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the resource group where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

zone_name.description: Specifies the Private DNS Zone where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

record.description: One or more `record` blocks as defined below.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

priority.description: The priority of the SRV record.

weight.description: The Weight of the SRV record.

port.description: The Port the service is listening on.

id.description: The Private DNS SRV Record ID.

fqdn.description: The FQDN of the DNS SRV Record.

create.description: Used when creating the Private DNS SRV Record.

update.description: Used when updating the Private DNS SRV Record.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Private DNS SRV Record.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Private DNS SRV Record.
